Sentencas: The integration of the gas turbine cycle and organic Rankine cycle with the solid oxide fuel cell for power generation is quite prevalent.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic analysis of SOFC-GT-VARS-ORC combined power and cooling system

Sentencas: However, the need is also felt for systems capable of providing power with cooling.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic analysis of SOFC-GT-VARS-ORC combined power and cooling system

Sentencas: Therefore, it is proposed to integrate solid oxide fuel cell with gas turbine cycle, vapour absorption refrigeration system and organic Rankine cycle through the heat available with fluid in the cycle.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic analysis of SOFC-GT-VARS-ORC combined power and cooling system

Sentencas: Here intercooled and reheat gas turbine cycle is integrated with solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic analysis of SOFC-GT-VARS-ORC combined power and cooling system

Sentencas: Heat rejected in intercooling is used in vapour absorption refrigeration system for cooling.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic analysis of SOFC-GT-VARS-ORC combined power and cooling system
Thermoeconomic analysis of SOFC-GT-VARS-ORC combined power and cooling system

Sentencas: Results show that the combination of solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine-vapour absorption refrigeration system-organic Rankine cycle yields increase in efficiency to 68.79% as compared to 58.88% from combined solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine cycle.
Titulo: Thermoeconomic analysis of SOFC-GT-VARS-ORC combined power and cooling system

Sentencas: The cost of electricity per unit power output is found as 1939.93 $/kW. (C) 2019
